data.eml:eml: New myrmecomorphous longhorned beetles from Haiti and the Dominican Republic with a key to Anaglyptini and Tillomorphini of Hispaniola (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Cerambycinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lingafelter, Steven W. (2011): New myrmecomorphous longhorned beetles from Haiti and the Dominican Republic with a key to Anaglyptini and Tillomorphini of Hispaniola (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae, Cerambycinae). ZooKeys 106: 55-75, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.106.1470, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.106.1470
